document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">much </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">joy! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">'Tis </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">much </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">joy! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">If </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">should </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">fail, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">what </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">poverty! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">yet, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">poor </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">as </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">ventured </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">opon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">throw! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">gained! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Yes! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Hesitated </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">so </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">This </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">side </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Victory! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Life </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Life! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Death, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Death! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Bliss </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">Bliss, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Breath </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Breath! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">indeed </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">fail, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">least, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">know </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">worst, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffb218">sweet! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Defeat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">means </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">nothing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">Defeat, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">No </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">drearier, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">befall! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">if </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44c4ff">gain! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d440ff">Gun </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">at </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#cc0004">sea, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff448c">Bells, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">steeples </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">At </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">first, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">repeat </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">it </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#d0ffa0">slow! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">For </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#f0ac5c">Heaven </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">different </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">thing, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">Conjectured, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">and </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ffec8c">waked </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#8cffa6">sudden </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">And </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">might </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#80ff60">extinguish </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: 'Tis so much joy! 'Tis so much joy!
